  • Classes in edu.xtec.jclic.clic3 used by edu.xtec.jclic 
    Class and Description
    Clic3Activity
    This class encapsulates the main properties of a Clic 3.0 activity, and provides methods to load it from a data stream and to convert it to a JClic Activity.

  • Classes in edu.xtec.jclic.clic3 used by edu.xtec.jclic.clic3 
    Class and Description
    Clic3
    Constants and miscellaneous functions useful to read Clic 3.0 files and import it into JClic projects.
    TripleColor
    This class is just a data structure with three Color objects, defining the background, foreground and shadow colors used to draw cells, and a boolean that indicates if a shadow should be painted under texts.
